coded_answer.p: In reply to your letter recievedreceived on the 13rd13th of June, I first would like to say that it is a great pleasure for me to have been choosedchosen.

First of all, you've asked me when I wantedwant to travel. In fact theirthere would be only one possibility in July because I will endfinish with my exams session at the end of thisthat month and beginnbegin a practicalvocational trainningtraining the 1rst1st of August.
To continue with the othersother information you need, I would prefer to sleep in a tent because of theits proximity to the nature.

Furthermore, I've choosedchosen two activities, whosewhich are Sailing and Climbingsailing and climbing. I've climbedI climbed for 3 years aswhile I was at school and I think that my levelstandard is still not too bad. In contraryConversely, I've never sailed in my life and would enjoy to startstarting with at Camp California. To end with, I would like to know how much money we will need for the free time and what kind of clothes and materialsequipment do I need to practisedo the activities I've choosedchosen.
I would like to thank you for alleverything, and am looking forward to hearing from you in the near future.

I've well received your last letter and want to thank youryou for the pictures you've joined withyou enclosed. You've asked me how was the Leysin Rock Festivalhow the Leysin Rock Festival was, but I still cannot find the words to explain how fabulous and unexpectable it was.
As you know, I was there to help forwith the good running of the concert and there waswere a lot of different things to do.

First, I had to controlto check the tickets at the entryentrance. In addition, there were some VIP'sVIPs to place. Then, during the concert, I've helpedI helped to serve the beers at the bar. I've metI met a lot of interrestinginteresting people while I was serving drinks.
Furthermore, I had to make announcements atover the loudspeaker for the children who wherewere lost.
AllEverything was very interrestinginteresting, but what I particularly liked about the experience iswas the human relations.

I've metI met a lot of different people and they all have learnedhave taughttaught me something new about behaviour or compationcompassion. I hope we will see useach other as soon as possible and I am waiting for your answerreply.
